ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | muld.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | addcomd.2 | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | addcand.3 | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | addcanad.4 | |- ( ph -> ( A + B ) = ( A + C ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_addcand | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + B ) = ( A + C ) <-> B = C ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> B = C ) |
